user.title: Configure Simarine
user.description:
Configure connection to your Simarine device.

You may either provide connection details manually, or leave the host field empty to use automatic discovery.

discover.title: Simarine Discovery
discover.description:
A Simarine device was discovered using UDP broadcast.

The values you entered on the previous screen for TCP/UDP ports and update interval have been retained.

Click retry to force a new scan.

error.no_devices_found: No Simarine devices were found on the network.
